SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, n.contentnohtml, n.STATUS, t2.category category, n.time_zone, DATE_FORMAT( n.news_date, "%Y-%m-%d %T" ) news_date, n.clicks, n.create_date , t3.path path FROM qgq_news n left join qgq_category t2 ON n.fk_categoryid = t2.id left join sys_attachments t3 on t3.billid = n.id
WHERE n.del != 1 AND n.STATUS = "已发布状态" ORDER BY n.news_date DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, n.contentnohtml, n.STATUS, t2.category category, n.time_zone, DATE_FORMAT( n.news_date, "%Y-%m-%d %T" ) news_date, n.clicks, n.create_date , t3.path path FROM qgq_news n left join qgq_category t2 ON n.fk_categoryid = t2.id left join sys_attachments t3 on t3.billid = n.id
WHERE n.del != 1 AND n.STATUS = "已发布状态"
and 1=1
and `n.time_zone` = #{timeZone}
ORDER BY n.news_date DESC LIMIT 3
